hadiths.text: Narrated Muhammad bin Abi Bakr Al-Thaqafi:While we were going from Mina to `Arafat, I asked Anas bin Malik, about Talbiya, "How did you use to say Talbiya in the company of the Prophet?" Anas said: "People used to say Talbiya and their saying was not objected to and they used to say Takbir and that was not objected to either

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّكْبِيرِ أَيَّامَ مِنًى وَإِذَا غَدَا إِلَى عَرَفَةَ
chapter.eng-name: To say Takbir on the days of Mina and while proceeding to Arafat
